content: गो {%<ab>m.</ab>%} {%<ab>f.</ab>%} ({%<ab>Nom.</ab>%}|गौः) [गच्छत्यनेन, गम् करणे डो <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} Cattle, kine (<ab>pl.</ab>). {@--2@} Anything coming from a cow; such as milk, flesh, leather &c. {@--3@} The stars. {@--4@} The sky. {@--5@} The thunder-bolt of Indra. {@--6@} A ray of light. {@--7@} A diamond. {@--8@} Heaven. {@--9@} An arrow. {%--<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} A cow; जुगोप गोरूपधरामिवोर्वी <ls>R. 2. 3</ls>; क्षीरिण्यः संतु गावः <ls>Mk. 10. 60.</ls> {@--2@} The earth; दुदोह गां स यज्ञाय <ls>R. 1. 26</ls>; गामात्तसारां रघुरप्यवेक्ष्य <ls n="R.">5. 26</ls>, <ls n="R. 5.">11</ls>. <ls n="R. 5.">36</ls>; <ls>Bg. 15. 13</ls>; सेकोऽनुगृह्णातु गां <ls>Mu. 3. 2</ls>; <ls>Me. 30.</ls> {@--3@} Speech, words; रघोरुदारामपि गां निशम्य <ls>R. 5. 12</ls>, <ls n="R.">2. 59</ls>; <ls>Ki. 4. 20.</ls> {@--4@} The goddess of speech, Sarasvatī. {@--5@} A mother. {@--6@} A quarter of the compass. {@--7@} Water (<ab>pl.</ab>). {@--8@} The eye. {@--9@} A region of the sky. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A bull, an ox; असंजातकिणस्कंधः सुखं स्वपिति गौर्गडिः <ls>K. P. 10</ls>; <ls>Ms. 4. 72</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> जरद्गव. {@--2@} The hair of the body. {@--3@} An organ of sense. {@--4@} The sign Taurus of the zodiac. {@--5@} The sun. {@--6@} The number ‘nine’ (in math.). {@--7@} The moon. {@--8@} A singer. {@--9@} A billion. {@--10@} A cowsacrifice. {@--11@} A house.
